```{r}
library(lingtypology)
```


```{r}
#Load the character data
file="../data/text_stats/lang_vecs_standardized.tsv"
char <- read.delim(file)
```


```{r}
#change a few language names so they correspond to the languages in reference tree
char[3,"lang"] <- "Eastern Armenian"
char[9,"lang"] <- "Western Farsi"
char[11,"lang"] <- "Scottish Gaelic"
char[28,"lang"] <- "Serbian Standard"
char[30,"lang"] <- "Slovenian"
char[33,"lang"] <- "Ukrainian"
map.feature(char$lang,label=iso.lang(char$lang),label.hide=FALSE,label.fsize = 8,label.position = 'right')
```
